ingredients: 12 ounces ground beef - 16 ounces if you're really hungry! (80% or 85% lean is best for this)
2 tablespoons taco seasoning (try this homemade taco seasoning mix)
1 roasted jalapeno pepper, sliced into rings - for serving
Extra creamy homemade guacamole for serving, if desired (Try this basic yet perfect guacamole recipe)
